name: Dig Deep: Race To The Core!
name_original: Dig Deep: Race To The Core!
description:
Are you ready to Dig Deep? Because you're going to have to if you want to beat your friends to the grand prize that lies at the centre of the Earth.

Your challenge is to race through the rooms of an underground bunker and tackle a variety of whacky mini games that lie inside. You'll be racing against everyone else so you need to make sure you don't fail! For some of these mini games you'll have to compete directly against the other players, for others you'll have to work around the other players. For some you'll even have to sabotage the other players! So watch out. Make sure you don't get left behind.

Now onwards adventurer, see if you can win the race to the Core!

Note: The game can be played in single player mode but we recommend for the best experience to play with as many people as possible.
